locations.title: Grand Central Station
locations.content: Grand Central Station may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Every time I get a car wash from here, it smells like rotten eggs and then the smell will stay in the car for a couple days. Location is convenient but I only use this one when necessary. And there is no dryer countdown timer.
2 clean showers that currently cost $7.50 with two towels about 15 spots no pull throughs big lot also truck wash in lot pretty clean and nice people! 24/7 very semi friendly

Great place with everything you would need from a gas station. But the car wash water at this location smells TERRIBLE. I have the Flash pass card and none of the other car washes grand central has smell like this.
Quick and easy fueling for all vehicles. Clean restrooms and lounge area. Car wash worked well. They also sell Live Bait.
Very nice place. Got gas and used the restroom.
Great chicken, and other amenities, clean, well kept, car wash,
Clean and bright,  decent amount of truck parking,  no showers that I saw.

showerReviews.reviewText: Don't know if it's a lack of cleaning or lack of use, but the dust bunnies in shower 1 will talk to you. Big dirt lot. With the shape of the restrooms and showers I'm not willing to chance eating here so I can't really comment on the food.

Nice truck stop, not many rigs here, plenty of space available, RVs appear to be welcome. Nice showers with hot water, great water pressure (used the handicap one).  Towels provided. Shower was $13 and they give $5 back when you return the ‚Ä¶
$15 for a shower and then when you‚Äôre done they give you five dollars back and the laundry is cheap
Shower curtains need to be changed shower walls need more cleaning has a restaurant lots of parking but it's dirt

gr8Stop friendly staff GoOoOd food

didn't fuel or shower. cold1sinthevooler

eZ in and out if ur headed east n2b west ethr

The staff I met was friendly, the place was clean. The wife and I are on a road trip and needed a place to wash clothes, eat and shower and they had all of the above. Food, ice cream, trailer parking, showers, coin operated laundromat, ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice ,clean little truck stop. They have 1 shower and they provide a towel and wash rag. All for the low price of $8. Cleaner than most TA's. They have a small truck parking area that has probably 15-20 spots. The prices are cheaper than ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ There is 1 shower here which is convenient and it was very clean. They do provide a fresh towel and wash cloth. ‚Ä¶

Great crew and nice shower available for $8.00.
Parking $10.00 after 4 hours.
Excellent restaurant next door home cooking favorite Foods from 6am-3pm!
5 minutes away from Ameicold Appleton Wisconsin

Very friendly staff. The shower was well cleaned and not too small. The store is well kept and stocked. Limited hours but it gives the traditional values vibe. Diner Nextdoor is probably fantastic because it‚Äôs always full!
Only about 15 parking spots at $10 daily, shower price 8 or 10 dollars nice store, great dinner next door at good prices
This place is great. Really nice employees and shower is clean. They're pretty cheap on prices for sure
Nice and friendly staff $8 for shower. They only have one but it nice and clean with Hot waterü§ó. Truck parking for about 20 trucks behind the diner. It close at 11pm. ‚Ä¶
They close at 8pm have only one shower, the owners work there and they are amazing that made the five star.
Not too bad. Small Place, have obe shower
Good price for a shower but there's only one and it has no toilet in it

showerReviews.reviewText: This truck stop is very NASTY shower disgusting not clean and the argue with you that they just cleaned them if this is clean, I would hate to see your house utterly disgusting. Look at the photos hairs and corn pads in the shower toilet ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Here if you buy diesel, you'll get free parking. If you spend $25 inside, you'll get free parking. If you buy shower you get free parking. The staff is nice and they have good variety of products inside. I wish they were all like this. Dri ‚Ä¶

New owners so now they charge for parking. I think it‚Äôs $15.00. I bought a $12.00 shower and got the parking for free. Nice shower. I would suggest bring your own towels. Lots of good near by walking distance. Workers there are really nice.
$12 for shower with towels, grab what you need from the rack by the counter. ‚Ä¶

Just took a shower at this facility. It was not by choice. It is definitely an old facility but the moment I walked in the door I could tell that the staff here really tried to do their best to give everyone a great experience there is a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ for truck stops aren‚Äôt very high. This is a decent place to rest at. They have a large lot, a McDonald‚Äôs AND a subway‚Ä¶ showers (for 10$) which is a great price. They also have laundry two washers and two dryers. (1.50 to dry and 1.50 to ‚Ä¶
Holes in parking lot are big enough for a semi to get swallowed up. Shower rooms very hot had to dress in the hallway to cool off
Great staff and friendly atmosphere. Easy in and out it‚Äôs $15 for overnight parking or free with shower or $25 inside purchase.

2 stars only because the staff was nice to deal with.
Washroom/ shower was dirty. If I wasn't dirty, I'd have been after leaving.
Not much in food...McDonald's or Subway.
A few other choices across the street.

Not bad , fuel price is good , you have to leave $5 deposit for ur shower till u bring ur towel back to them , shower is not really comfortable but is ok for quick shower , driver waiting room old need update , they have McDonald‚Äôs there ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Had a friend just stopped wanted to take a shower and eat. 2 ladies behind the counter told him  it be a hour or longer for the showers to be cleaned. There was only 2 other trucks in the whole parking lot.  What bs

Great place to stop and get something to eat or take a shower.
Showers are 5.00 and parking lot has plenty of parking. Restaurant has great food and the staff is friendly.
I'll be back..

Went in to try to get a shower, story about one of their showers is out of order, no sign on that door, another about they have a customer in there from last night, other assorted b.s. left. Parking lot is large as mentioned b4. Some food ‚Ä¶
Nice truckstop. Wont find a nicer $5 shower. Good food in resturaunt and large selection of local smoked meats and cheese. Think i gained 10lbs in 34hrs
Beautiful and clean, big shower rooms only $5 ( if you don't fuel, they only have 3 tho)
Great out of knowhere place.passed by in route to loaded.i came back took clean shower n great breakfast üç≥. would tell everyone about this gem in woods ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop
locations.content: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be
